# add

## Syntax

add {widget|value} to {layout|widget}

## Parameters

- `widget|value`: The widget or value to add.
- `layout|widget`: The layout or widget to add to.

## Description

Adds a widget or value to a layout, group, list, or combo box. Supports adding stretch, spacers, and positioning in grid layouts.

## Examples

```
add Label to Layout
add stretch to Layout
add spacer size 20 to Layout
add Widget at 0 1 in Grid
```
